- Add Spanish
- Bugs fixed & improvement

- Special Summon: a specialized summon, tickets acquired as rewards from 10x Gem Summons, focused hero guaranteed after 50 summons.
- New Hero: Bloom.
- New Avatar for Halloween 2020: gives 20% Lifesteal until November 15th.
- Idle Campaign time reduced: 5 minutes to 20 seconds.
- Improvements & bugs fixed

- Add Thai language.
- Quick Battle for Rainbow Forest and Elemental Dungeon.
- Quick Battle (simulated) for Bounty Board.
- Damage in Arena battles will be doubled after 5 turns.
- Re-balance some heroes.
- Improvements & bugs fixed.
- Add Sign in with Apple.

- New feature: Gaia Blessing: player picks a faction and receives bonus stats for heroes of that faction. Only available in PvE battles.
- Lucky Clover Quest: quests that reward Lucky Clovers, shows up every once in a while.
- 2020 Xmas event.
- 2 new heroes.
- Special Gacha: Rosie and Theon.
- Home screen backgrounds.
